feed.title: Portage la Prairie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 12:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -21.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -25.6°C
Wind: NW 36 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening and ending late this evening. Clearing overnight. Blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
